cause.description:
Founded after the fall of communisim in 1990, Romanian Children's Relief supports the professional development and daily work of 22 Romanian specialists and over 400 volunteers working with more than 1,600 children and families in Bucharest and Bistrita, Romania. Fundatia Inocenti is our Romanian partner. Your support goes directly to the children who need our help.
1. Programs to support handicapped children
2. Programs to support children in hospitals and orphanages
3. Programs to build early childhood literacy
4. Programs to help Roma children attend school
cause.mission: Romanian Children's Relief is a 501c3 charity working to help Romanian children and families in need, and prevent child abandonment.
cause.name: ROMANIAN CHILDREN'S RELIEF / Fundatia Inocenti
